did.unittitle: Legislation - Railroad - Barkley-Howell Bill - Amendment to the Transportation Act of 1920 - S. 2646, Arbitration of Disputes Between Carriers and Employees - Howell-Barkley Railway Labor Act - H.R. 7358 Amendment - Editor, Courier Journal, Legislation Since 1888 - J.H. Scales, Esch Bill, Howell-Barkley Bill - Labor Organization Endorsing Railway Labor Act, S.E.
